name: Checkout Mestres do WP for WooCommerce
author: Mestres do WP

sections.description:
⭐Pro | Demo | Documentation | Community | Telegram ⭐

Explore a variety of tools designed to enhance your customer’s shopping journey.

👉 Simplified Direct Checkout

Simplify the checkout process, enabling your customers to complete their purchases in just a few clicks. More convenience, fewer steps!

👉 One-Page Checkout and Layouts

Mix all the functionalities of the cart and checkout into a single page. Your customers can adjust quantities and remove products directly on this page, resulting in a smoother checkout experience with fewer interruptions.

👉 Streamlined Checkout Enhancement

Provide an improved checkout experience with a smoother and more linear process. Less friction leads to higher conversion rates and more loyal customers.

👉 Checkout Split into Stages

Boost user satisfaction and conversions by dividing the checkout process into simpler and clearer stages.

👉 Constant Compatibility and Support

Developed with WooCommerce’s standard models, ensuring compatibility with most themes. If you find any issues, our support is ready to assist in the dedicated forum.

👉 Quick Simplification

Simplify and optimize the checkout process for your customers within minutes! Forget the complexity of building pages and funnels. The templates are ready for immediate use. Attract more customers, achieve more sales! 🚀✨

PRO

  • Customizable one-page checkout
  • Automatic address for residents in Brazil
  • Seamless integration with Google Tag Manager
  • Recovery of abandoned carts via email and WhatsApp
  • Recovery of pending payments via email and WhatsApp
  • Shipping simulator on the product page
  • Installment simulator on the product page
  • Discounts for payment methods
  • Personalized login and registration pages
  • Custom transactional emails and messages via WhatsApp
  • Automated delivery of tracking codes via email and WhatsApp messages
  • Integration with Correios, Melhor Envio, Frenet, Mandabem, Kangu
  • Personalized thank you pages
  • Additional offer during checkout (Order bump)

⭐Pro | Demo | Documentation | Community | Telegram ⭐
sections.installation:
Automatic installation through WordPress

  1. Select Add New in your WordPress on the Plugins tab.
  2. Look for Checkout Mestres WP.
  3. Click on Install Now and Activate Plugin.

For manual installation via FTP:

  1. Upload the checkout-mestres-wp to the /wp-content/plugins/ folder.
  2. Activate it in the Plugins section of your WordPress.

v8.0 04/10/2024

v7.3.6 03/29/2024

  • Checkout testado e adaptado para os temas Astra, Boutique, Deli, Electro, Flatsome, Hello Elementor, Kadence, Neve, OceanWP, Phlox PRO, Porto, Shopkeeper, Storefront, Sidney.
  • Adicionada verificação do evento cron cwmp_cron_events responsável pela automatização do Checkout Mestres do WP.
  • Todas as funcionalidades testadas e validadas.
  • Diversas pequenas correções realizadas.

sections.reviews:
Perca de tempo e grana

By diesenhus on December 27, 2023

Infelizmente o Plugin não tem suporte. É uma pena por que design estava bem legal.

Pedi cancelamento e nada. Fui roubado!

By andersonrp on December 15, 2023

É uma pena, pois para vender são ótimos, porém ao solicitar o cancelamento através do suporte. Já era...dinheiro perdido!

Ruim, mas ruim com força

By phdiegues on March 1, 2024

O plugin é muito problemático, vc reporta os problemas e o Bernardo na maioria das vezes fala que o plugin não afeta a parte com o problema, daí você desabilita o checkout e tudo volta a funcionar, o pior de tudo, pasmem, tenho a licença vitalícia e fui excluído do grupo de suporte pois reclamei (quanto a isso irei tomar as devidas providências legais). Além de bugado o DEV não tem profissionalismo e não consegue ouvir críticas.

Melhor checkout do mercado até o momento.

By Tony Rodrigues (trodriguezzz) on October 28, 2023

Altamente recomendado! O Checkout Mestre WP se tornou uma ferramenta essencial em quase todas as lojas que gerenciamos aqui na agência. O que realmente nos impressiona é o comprometimento constante da equipe, especialmente do Bernardo, em aprimorar o plugin. Além disso, o suporte via Telegram é ágil e sempre disposto a ajudar. Este projeto tem um futuro brilhante pela frente. Vida longa ao Checkout Mestre WP!

Plug-in sensacional

By brunoxavi on October 28, 2023

Demorei pra encontrar um plug-in completo assim, me ajudou bastante! Se seguir o passo a passo e explicações que o suporte da não tem como não ficar satisfeito.

Recomendo!

Plugin que ajuda bastante!

By mmedeirosbz on October 27, 2023

Plugin que ajuda bastante no que se refere a diversos temas relacionados ao checkout. Com a melhora do suporte pós venda tende a ser o melhor plugin brasileiro de checkout. Tenho atualmente em duas lojas online.

Plugin confuso e sem suporte

By remiCs (emersong20) on October 27, 2023

Tive dificuldades em fazer a instalação na minha loja e a documentação do site é confusa.

Melhor checkout para Woocommerce!

By jordgam on October 27, 2023

Melhor checkout para Woocommerce!

Checkout muito bom e melhorando a cada update

By nimitz909 on October 27, 2023

o checkout é muito bom e as demais funções melhoram a cada update.

Ótimo checkout

By rodrigoalcab on October 26, 2023

Layout clean e a página de obrigado ajuda bastante.

short_description: Transform the Shopping Experience with Ease and Efficiency on your WooCommerce Site
description:
⭐Pro | Demo | Documentation | Community | Telegram ⭐

Explore a variety of tools designed to enhance your customer’s shopping journey.

👉 Simplified Direct Checkout

Simplify the checkout process, enabling your customers to complete their purchases in just a few clicks. More convenience, fewer steps!

👉 One-Page Checkout and Layouts

Mix all the functionalities of the cart and checkout into a single page. Your customers can adjust quantities and remove products directly on this page, resulting in a smoother checkout experience with fewer interruptions.

👉 Streamlined Checkout Enhancement

Provide an improved checkout experience with a smoother and more linear process. Less friction leads to higher conversion rates and more loyal customers.

👉 Checkout Split into Stages

Boost user satisfaction and conversions by dividing the checkout process into simpler and clearer stages.

👉 Constant Compatibility and Support

Developed with WooCommerce’s standard models, ensuring compatibility with most themes. If you find any issues, our support is ready to assist in the dedicated forum.

👉 Quick Simplification

Simplify and optimize the checkout process for your customers within minutes! Forget the complexity of building pages and funnels. The templates are ready for immediate use. Attract more customers, achieve more sales! 🚀✨

PRO

  • Customizable one-page checkout
  • Automatic address for residents in Brazil
  • Seamless integration with Google Tag Manager
  • Recovery of abandoned carts via email and WhatsApp
  • Recovery of pending payments via email and WhatsApp
  • Shipping simulator on the product page
  • Installment simulator on the product page
  • Discounts for payment methods
  • Personalized login and registration pages
  • Custom transactional emails and messages via WhatsApp
  • Automated delivery of tracking codes via email and WhatsApp messages
  • Integration with Correios, Melhor Envio, Frenet, Mandabem, Kangu
  • Personalized thank you pages
  • Additional offer during checkout (Order bump)

⭐Pro | Demo | Documentation | Community | Telegram ⭐

8.caption: Product Page with Shipping Cost Calculator
